constraint.name: ca_lineasliquidacioncomision_facturas
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idfactura) REFERENCES facturascli (idfactura) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_lineasliquidacioncomision_liquidacion
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idliquidacion) REFERENCES settledcommissions (idliquidacion) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
